name: Fix My Robot
description:
A simple platformer made for Weekly Game Jam 104: Fix it.

Controls: A and S to move, Space to jump

Your robot companion has broken down, and it's up to you to fix it. Collect all the robot parts in the level to fix your robot, while avoiding dangerous pitfalls and obstacles.

Game was finished up rather quickly due to lack of time and motivation, so there's definitely some issues. Feel free to let me know in the comments about any bugs and what you think of the game!

Things I'm aware of:

  • Screen tearing
  • Moving objects take too long to come back and don't wait for you
  • Some collision issues
  • Jitter when on platforms or bolts
